meanings.definition: To decorate with a woven design
meanings.sent1: She carefully damasked the tablecloth with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: The artist damasked the walls of the room with beautiful floral motifs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat damasked the sofa with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter damasked the room with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sun damasked the sky with hues of pink and orange at sunset.

meanings.sent1: The damasked curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The damasked fabric felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The damasked wallpaper made the room look cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: Her damasked dress shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent5: The damasked rug brought a touch of luxury to the living room.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a woven design
meanings.sent1: She chose a beautiful damasked fabric for the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The table was covered with a damasked tablecloth for the special dinner.
meanings.sent3: The damasked fabric was soft and luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent4: The damasked material had a subtle sheen under the light.
meanings.sent5: The damasked fabric added a touch of sophistication to the room.
